name: webpack-mpa
description: Multi page app setup with webpack

scripts.svg: svgo -f assets/images/svg --config='{ "plugins": [{ "cleanupAttrs": true }, { "removeDoctype": true }, { "removeXMLProcInst": true }, { "removeComments": true }, { "removeMetadata": true }, { "removeUselessDefs": true }, { "removeEditorsNSData": true }, { "removeEmptyAttrs": true }, { "removeHiddenElems": false }, { "removeEmptyText": true }, { "removeEmptyContainers": true }, { "cleanupEnableBackground": true }, { "removeViewBox": false }, { "cleanupIDs": false }, { "convertStyleToAttrs": true }, { "removeUselessStrokeAndFill": true }] }' && spritesh -q -i assets/images/svg -o ./assets/dist/sprite.svg -p svg-

author: Atanas Atanasov <scriptex.bg@gmail.com> (http://atanas.info)
